title: Are there any communities for abuse survivors and advocates? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am an Advocate have been in the social service field for over 20 year, but in order for mento give you detailed honest information, and I'm not really sure I understand what you are asking for exactly, services or an actual community, could you be a little more specific plz.?

In some cities, there are Meetup groups. Link here: Narcissistic abuse survivors groups And many many facebook pages: Narcissistic Abuse and Codependency Recovery with Lisa A. Romano Excellent community on youtube.
